API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash from https://my.telegram.org

ADMIN.description: Telegram user ID of the bot admin

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Channel ID for logs (must be a Telegram channel where bot is admin)

IS_FSUB.description: Enable Force Subscribe? Set to True or False

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: Telegram channel IDs allowed to use the bot (space-separated for multiple)
